content:
Debate about the right #CovidVaccine pace continues in Europe's press.

Pressure is growing on the European Medicines Agency (EMA), which is due to announce its decision on the #PfizerBioNTech vaccine on Dec 21. 

Thoughts in English.

@elifcakirr
date: Covid vaccination: EU at the readyThe European Medicines Agency is due to reach a decision on approving the Biontech/Pfizer vaccine today.eurotopics.net
